title: Imp

properties.name: description
properties.value: Imps are amongst the smallest creatures in Gielinor. They are central in the Imp Catcher quest due to their unique bead drops. Sometimes, an imp may disappear into a puff of smoke and teleport a short distance away. At level 71 Hunter players may catch imps with magic boxes, including imps found in the God Wars Dungeons.

 This article has a money making guide: Killing imps.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.
This article is about the monster. For the NPC that players are transformed into, see Imp (Castle Wars).

Imps are amongst the smallest creatures in Gielinor. They are central in the Imp Catcher quest due to their unique bead drops. Sometimes, an imp may disappear into a puff of smoke and teleport a short distance away. At level 71 Hunter players may catch imps with magic boxes, including imps found in the God Wars Dungeons.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Imp kill is worth 624.8.

  1. ↑ Looting bags are only dropped by imps in the Wilderness.
  2. ↑ Ecumenical keys are only dropped in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  3. ↑ Ecumenical key drop rates increase to 1/55, 1/50, 1/45, and 1/40 after completion of the hard, elite, master, and grandmaster Combat Achievements respectively.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update | poll)

Imps now drops fiendish ashes in place of regular ashes.

17 March 2021
(update)

Several monsters, including Imps, were tagged as demonic, allowing demonbane weapons to work on them.

8 August 2019
(update)

The drop rate for ecumenical keys have been changed to be 1/60 regardless of keys owned.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
29 March 2004 –
21 November 2006 		21 November 2006 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The standard variant of imps had a festive override wearing a white partyhat during the 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, and 2021 Christmas events. The hunter icon also had the override for the events from 2016-2019.
